properties.entry: SELECT /*com.greedy.memberlog.model.dao.MemberLogDAO#userLogin()*/ A.MEMBER_PASSWORD FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberLogDAO#searchById()*/ B.* FROM TBL_MEMBER B WHERE B.MEMBER_PHONE = ?
SELECT /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberLogDAO#searchById()*/ C.* FROM TBL_MEMBER C WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#editPwd()*/ TBL_MEMBER D SET D.MEMBER_PASSWORD = ? WHERE D.MEMBER_NAME = ?
